DOC.brief_summary: This First-In-Man study design examine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics functional activity ADC3680B single multiple dose healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics ADC3680B Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 Signed date write informed consent prior admission study Willing able comply requirement protocol available complete study Evidence history clinically significant medical disorder History severe allergy/hypersensitivity ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity
